alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 11:25PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Logan and west central Gove Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1125 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Oakley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Logan and west central Gove Counties. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 76 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
